name: Easy Banana Nut Pancakes
author: CoOkInGnUt
summary: This has to be one of the best pancakes I have ever had. They smell wonderful and taste like banana nut bread! When you make these on a Sunday morning, they disappear before you know it.
directions: Mix flour, walnuts, sugar, baking powder, nutmeg, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl; make a well in the center
Whisk almond milk, bananas, melted butter, and vanilla extract together in a separate bowl until smooth
Pour mixture into the well in the flour mixture; stir until just combined
Heat a lightly oiled skillet over medium-high heat
Drop 1/4 cup batter into the skillet; tilt gently to spread batter evenly
Cook until bubbles form and the edges are firm, 3 to 4 minutes
Flip and cook until browned on the other side, 1 to 2 minutes more
